Description: Blue glazed composition finger-ring: with an open-work bezel in form of 'wedjat'-eye.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt) (said to have come from)
Curator's comments: Compare T. Eric Peet & C. Leonard Woolley ‘et al.’, ‘The City of Akhenaten. Excavations of 1921 and 1922 at el-‘Amarneh’, Pt. I, (London 1923), pl. xi, 3.
